issue.title: gazebo and gzserver return without error if gzserver is already running

content.raw:
The check for an existing server is in [void Master::Init](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e4a82bd4/gazebo/Master.cc?at=default#cl-42), which throws an exception if detected. We could change the return type to `bool Master::Init` and return false instead of throwing an exception. This would break ABI.

Adding different logic to the gazebo startup would take a little more work.
